class.name: CapsuleShape3D
class.description: 3D capsule shape to be added as a [i]direct[/i] child of a [PhysicsBody3D] or [Area3D] using a [CollisionShape3D] node. In 3D, a capsule is a cylinder shape with hemispheres at both ends. [b]Performance:[/b] Being a primitive collision shape, [CapsuleShape3D] is fast to check collisions against (though not as fast as [SphereShape3D]). [CapsuleShape3D] is cheaper to check collisions against compared to [CylinderShape3D].
